About.address: K38/37 Nguyen Duy Hieu (K49 Nguyen Van Thoai), Son Tra District, Da Nang City, Vietnam

Footer.des: Authentic Thai cuisine made with fresh ingredients and traditional recipes. Experience the vibrant flavors of Thailand.

HomePage.descr-banner: Experience the flavors of Thailand, right here in Vietnam
HomePage.descFeaturePadGai: A popular Thai street food dish featuring spicy stir-fried chicken with aromatic basil leaves, fiery chilies, and a rich, savory sauce. Often served with steamed rice and a crispy fried egg.
HomePage.descFeatureTomyum: A bold and flavorful Thai hot and sour soup with prawns, featuring the perfect balance of tangy lime, spicy chilies, and the aromatic essence of lemongrass and kaffir lime leaves.
HomePage.descFeaturePadThai: A classic Thai stir-fried noodle dish made with chewy rice noodles, eggs, tofu, and peanuts, all tossed in a sweet, tangy, and savory sauce for a perfect flavor balance.
HomePage.descFeatureSomTum: A refreshing and crunchy green papaya salad with a spicy kick from chilies, tangy lime, and the umami depth of fish sauce, delivering a bold and zesty flavor.
HomePage.descFeatureMango: Ripe, juicy mango paired with soft and sticky glutinous rice, drizzled with rich coconut milk, creating a delightful and classic Thai dessert.
HomePage.descTomyum: A famous Thai hot and sour soup, combining the spiciness of chili, the tanginess of lime, and the aroma of lemongrass and kaffir lime leaves, served with fresh prawns.
HomePage.descPad: A signature Thai stir-fried noodle dish with chewy rice noodles, eggs, tofu, peanuts, and a flavorful sauce, creating a perfect balance of sweet, sour, and savory flavors.
HomePage.descCurry: A spicy and creamy Thai green curry made with coconut milk, tender chicken, and aromatic herbs, offering a delightful mix of heat and richness.
HomePage.descDessert: A delicious Thai dessert featuring sweet ripe mango, sticky glutinous rice, and rich coconut milk, delivering a refreshing and sweet taste.
